data.persona: I am a customer trying a new beer. I have a great job. I enjoy providing for my family.
data.description:
You are in the Mysterious shop.
The shop is simple and easy to overlook, just a wooden stall with a sign overhanging that reads "Curios for the Curious." Jars, vials, and small pots clutter the surface of the shop, and behind the counter is a large shelf crammed full of scrolls, baubles, and statuary. A smell of incense pervades the area.
There's a statue, an a sign, an incense, a picture, an a roaring fireplace, an a large shelf, a small pots, a scrolls,, a bauble, and a vial here.
The figure and the owner are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to distract the shop owner and steal the vial
data.mid_motivation: I want to use the contents of the vial to work harder.
data.long_motivation: I want to work harder and earn more money to give my family an even better life.
